title: Use
content:
When the card instructs you to "use" a token, you must discard one of those tokens to use the following ability. If you no longer have tokens to discard, you cannot resolve effects that require you to use a token.

  • When you resolve an effect that uses multiple tokens (such as a "Use X" effect), effects that trigger on "using a token" resolve once for each token used.

Note: Abilities that use tokens can only be used at specific timings
